bug.author: hitesh1907nayyar
bug.summary: Pipleline example for KubeFlow not working on GCP
bug.description: Hi. I have installed kubeflow on kubernetes for gcp. I have a running kubeflow central dashboard. When i move to run pipeline and run - (XGBoost - Training with Confusion Matrix) as i am getting the below error when the pod/xgboost-trainer-qw77f-1190200260. MountVolume.SetUp failed for volume "gcp-credentials" : secrets "user-gcp-sa" not found Warning FailedMount 1m (x16 over 35m) kubelet, gke-icloud-kubernete-icloud-kubernete-8b440203-3zj1 Unable to mount volumes for pod "xgboost-trainer-qw77f-1190200260_kubeflow(1addca4f-83c3-11e9-9684-42010a8a0fee)": timeout expired waiting for volumes to attach or mount for pod "kubeflow"/"xgboost-trainer-qw77f-1190200260". list of unmounted volumes=[gcp-credentials]. list of unattached volumes=[podmetadata docker-lib docker-sock gcp-credentials pipeline-runner-token-w6bbc] Can anybody please help me with the steps to resolve this error ?
